programme.desc: The proactive science education program which encourages primary and lower secondary school children to discover and investigate the mysteries which puzzle them.

programme.title: Japan'S Top Inventions(28Min.)
programme.desc: The fascinating stories and secrets behind hit Japanese products, plus parts and machines that boast the top share of niche markets. This time: radio controlled watches and encrusting machines.

programme.title: Bosai
programme.desc: Find out about Japan's emergency food options that meet the needs of various people. Also discover the rolling stock method, a smart way to stockpile emergency food.

programme.title: The Rise And Fall Of A Crypto Star

programme.title: Hometown Stories

programme.desc: A "total golden hall" suddenly appears in a remote place, Hiraizumi Town, Iwate Prefecture. 3DCG has made it possible to learn new facts that were previously unknown even to experts.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: The ancient capital's dignified air is in part generated by earthen walls. Discover the aesthetic sensibilities and expertise of a traditional plasterer as he pursues beauty in earthen walls.

programme.title: Wild Hokkaido!
programme.desc: Toni and Evan are not only snowboarders but also expert surfers. They take cracks at boarding freely in the mountains as well as on the sea during the bitter frigid winter of Hokkaido.

programme.title: Direct Talk

programme.title: Learn Japanese From The News
programme.desc: Japan plans to widen access to day cares to all children, regardless of whether their parents work or not. Starting FY 2024, trials will be conducted in around 150 municipalities across the country.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Moreno vs. Royval 2
programme.desc: Main Event - The UFC returns to Mexico City on February 24 with a stacked card featuring a host of the nations best mixed martial artists. In the main event, Mexicos first UFC champion, Brandon Moreno, continues on his road back to the flyweight crown when he faces Brandon Royval for the second time in a five-round main event showdown. Plus, its expected to be an early Fight of the Year candidate in another rematch when featherweight stars Yair Rodriguez and Brian Ortega clash in an all-action five-round battle

programme.desc: At UFC 284, as newly crowned lightweight champion Islam Makhachev defends his title for the first time against the undisputed featherweight champion, Australias own Alexander Volkanovski. Plus, the interim featherweight title will be on the line in the co-main event when top contenders Yair Rodriguez and Josh Emmett collide. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep8
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep8
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Rozenstruik vs. Gaziev
programme.desc: Prelims - The heavyweights take center stage at the APEX on Sunday, March 3, when unbeaten rising star Shamil Gaziev looks to smash his way into the Top 15 when he faces noted knockout artist Jairzinho Rozenstruik in the main event of UFC Fight Night. Unbeaten in 12 pro fights, Bahrains Gaziev kept the momentum going from his win on Dana Whites Contender Series with a knockout of Martin Buday, and now hell tackle the equally imposing Rozenstruik, who has scored knockouts in all seven of his UFC wins, stopping Junior Dos Santos, Alistair Overeem and Andrei Arlovski in the process
